mapper.insert: insert into business (name, intro, scope, tel, address, open_date, license_img, license_number, legal_name, legal_tel, legal_idcard, main_store) values (#{name}, #{intro}, #{scope}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{openDate}, #{licenseImg}, #{licenseNumber}, #{legalName}, #{legalTel}, #{legalIdcard}, #{mainStore})
mapper.update: update business set name = #{name}, intro = #{intro}, scope = #{scope}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, open_date = #{openDate}, license_img = #{licenseImg}, license_number = #{licenseNumber}, legal_name = #{legalName}, legal_tel = #{legalTel}, legal_idcard = #{legalIdcard}, main_store = #{mainStore} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, intro, scope, tel, address, open_date, license_img, license_number, legal_name, legal_tel, legal_idcard, main_store from business where id = #{id}
